import React, { useState, Fragment, useContext } from "react"; import Axios from "axios"; import { Row, Col, Card, CardBody, Button, Label, Input, Container, } from "reactstrap"; import ReadOnly from "./ReadOnly"; import EditableData from "./EditableData"; import { PlacesContext } from "../PetPlaces/PlacesContext"; import "./DataTables.css"; const DataTable = () => { const { places, addNew, columns } = useContext(PlacesContext); const [placesValue, setPlacesValue] = places; const [addNewValue, setAddNewValue] = addNew; const [columnsValue, setcolumnsvalue] = columns; // const [addFormData, setFormData] = useState({}); const [searchParam, setSearchParam] = useState(""); const [editContactId, setEditContactId] = useState(null); const handleEditClick = (event, product) => { event.preventDefault(); setEditContactId(product.id); }; const filteredData = placesValue.filter((place) => place.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchParam.toLowerCase()) ); const token = "eyJraWQiOiJqYUh6OTFhVytuUSt4S1Jnd0Rjd1pUV0ZsbW1YUTBtZ0V0ZXVsUFFpTmtZPSIsImFsZyI6IlJTMjU2In0..RHzlfX0KftPOa_p5GvWtRQ8sBaE92g1oebkMITAA9XqpD4Ani2aQ9p26jCHfJiQQN6XIX0_7_o-LE4XqTMwE8peTI7TLBZTjD03Snlh9LnhqA0E4in2dEKbqjlueCMu2UU9fH4eNK0xsGGRc4viPZEfG9axrwA6nZe5B8Dh8jn9KplhJLUHEw4bwCGZKN4ao9ZtFgfpf48iGUOUZcDGq57TjGhk_zquSASgeBLXcQC-RUGp_uK8aVaMc2tbWUvS--rWzjS_7Gmor-G7Dju-LfcaMpP5ctG-jVp_Y96b_KMGcrPWlCBwhVF6aYnpPTiLe9doJ8CLqhyOgGA06j-TsJA"; const bodyParameters = { pic: { pic: [ { url: "760634d2-f8ec-4caa-9a2d-14a8828cfb5dpetplace.jpg", }, { url: "760634d2-f8ec-4caa-9a2d-14a8828cfb5dpetplace.jpg", }, ], }, title: "Hangout", title_icon: "760634d2-f8ec-4caa-9a2d-14a8828cfb5dpetplace.jpg", social_link: { social_link: [ { facebook: "facebook.com", }, { instagram: "instagram.com", }, ], }, phone_number: "+9233345678", address: "lahore", lat: "53.958332", long: "‑1.080278", postcode: "5457", start_time: "2021-11-15T12:15:39.658Z", end_time: "2021-11-15T12:15:39.658Z", email: "m.naveedashfaq@gmail.com", web_url: "www.google.com", createdAt: "2021-11-15T12:15:39.658Z", category: 1, }; const config = { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }, }; const url = "18.216.174.90:3000/api/petplace"; const addPlace = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); Axios.get(url, config).then(console.log("data")).catch(console.log); }; return (
{!addNewValue ? (
setSearchParam(e.target.value)} />
{columnsValue.map((header) => ( ))} {filteredData.map((product) => ( {editContactId === product.id ? ( ) : ( )} ))}
{header.title}
) : (
{ // this.setState({ title: e.target.value }); // }} /> { // this.setState({ time: e.target.value }); // }} /> { // this.setState({ time: e.target.value }); // }} />
)}
); }; export default DataTable;
